thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com
thread.title: Jeffrey Cochrane

author: Jeffrey Cochrane
title: Jeffrey Cochrane
text: Of all the book services out there, Biblio is definitely the best. I have found using their sellers, I not only have the best luck finding the particular book I'm looking for but can find it for the best price. This site is always the first one I search. And nine out of ten times, it is the only site I have to check. Also if there is any kind of problem, Biblio steps in and corrects it. I have over 8,000 books and am always trying to find one that I don't have from an author. This is where I will always go first.
